addContractMethod(uint256,bytes32,bytes3.details: Register a contract method for a contract by its name

params.cName: Name of the contract we want an address for
params.fnData: Calldata transformation information for library delegatecall
params.selector: Hash of the method signature to register to the contract (keccak256)
params.version: Version of Platform for contract method association

addContractMethods(uint256,bytes32,bytes.details: Batch register contract methods for a contract by its name, that share the same injected and dynamic params

params.cName: Name of the contract we want an address for
params.fnData: Calldata transformation information for library delegatecall
params.modifiedSelectors: Hashes of the library-specific method signatures to register to the contract (keccak256)
params.selectors: Hashes of the method signatures to register to the contract (keccak256)
params.version: Version of Platform for contract method association

createVersion(uint256).details: Create a new version of Platform

getContract(uint256,bytes32).details: Returns the address of a contract given its name

params.cName: Name of the contract we want an address for
params.version: Version of Platform to lookup the address on

getContractMethod(uint256,bytes32,bytes3.details: Gets calldata transformation information for a library name and function selector

params.cName: Name of the contract we want an address for
params.selector: Hash of the method signature to register to the contract (keccak256)
params.version: Version of Platform for the method request

getContractMethod(uint256,bytes32,bytes3.return: Calldata transformation information for library delegatecall

getContractType(address).details: Gets the associated type for a contract address

params.cAddress: Address of the contract we want to get the type for

getLibraryName(address).details: Returns the library name for a given contract address

getVersion().details: Get the current version of Platform

setContract(uint256,bytes32,address).details: Set a contract address for a contract by a given name

params.cName: Name of the contract we want to set an address for
params.version: Version of Platform this contract belongs to

setContractType(address,uint256).details: Associates a contract address with a type

params.cAddress: Address of the contract we want to set the type
params.cType: Type we want to associate the contract address with

setLibraryName(uint256,bytes32).details: Associates a contract type with a library name

setVersion(uint256).details: Set the current version of Platform

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
